comments.body: Moving the code here by the same reason as at https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/31066/files#r556497006. `sparkSession.table(tableIdent)` overrides catalog table fields according to test's settings at: https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/3fdbc48373cdf12b8ba05632bc65ad49b7af1afb/sql/core/src/main/scala/org/apache/spark/sql/internal/CatalogImpl.scala#L517
